chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:
The phone is dirty and smudgy, especially at the microphone and earpiece. Even with a used device, I expect it to be cleaned. Therefore, I would like to return the purchase.

Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt ist außerhalb der Garantie.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

Upon receipt of the device, we have noticed that the camera has cracks on it, which was not mentioned by the customer previously. Since the customer has had the device for 6 days, this implies that he was happy with the condition of the device. However, as there are cracks on the camera now, it is now considered out of warranty and we are unable to issue a refund. We will be returning the device to the customer instead.

Regards,
JH

Hi ecomobile,

you haven’t refunded the customer within the mandatory 2 business day timeline. If you suspect fraud or haven’t received the package, please click “Report a problem”.

If we don’t hear from you, we will automatically refund the customer within 1 business day.

Thanks for your help,
Derya Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

There is some system error which results in delay in refunding.

Regards,
KW
